checklistDescription: Complete this comprehensive business health checklist to assess your business across multiple areas. Your progress will be saved and you can share your results via a single URL.

forms.title: Business Strategy
forms.description: Assess your business planning, strategy and competitive positioning

forms.title: Understanding Customers
forms.description: Evaluate your customer knowledge and engagement strategies

forms.title: Business Operations
forms.description: Review your operational efficiency and processes

forms.title: Financial Management
forms.description: Assess your financial planning and management practices
